title: Willett hockey stick & front miscut w/ Old Mill back
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Willett hockey stick & front miscut w/ Old Mill back
posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

Willett "hockey stick" (recurring print oddity - nail stuck in the roller) $450

Payne Old Mill miscut $300
